About me

I'm a personal stylist. Currently I work in Estonia, Tallinn and collect unique wardrobes for men and women to suit their goals, objectives and lifestyle.

My work is my passion, my lifestyle and I am very glad that I have found something that I really enjoy doing.

I graduated from the Estonian fashion school "SMK Iluinstituut", the Italian fashion school "Scuola di Moda" and most recently completed my studies at the "Talentsy School" in Moscow.


My goal is to help you discover new dimensions of your style, inspired by current trends and taking into account your individual preferences. With my professional approach and fresh perspective on fashion, each look will be your unique expression.
